help.stillNeedHelpDesc: Our support team will respond within 24 hours

faqs.a1: Enter your learning goal, tech stack, and level on the home page, then click 'Generate'.
faqs.a2: Yes, select your level (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced) when creating a project to adjust quiz difficulty.
faqs.a3: Access past projects from the 'History' section in the sidebar.
faqs.a4: Yes, click 'Edit settings and regenerate' button on the roadmap page.
faqs.q5: What are the free plan limits?
faqs.a5: Free plan allows up to 5 projects per month. Consider upgrading to Pro for unlimited access.

footer.title: Still need assistance?
footer.desc: Our concierge team is available 24/7 to ensure your experience is flawless.

faqItems.a1: Cartes is a platform that uses AI to generate customized learning roadmaps tailored to your learning goals. You can efficiently acquire skills through project-based learning.
faqItems.a2: First, create an account and enter what you want to build on the homepage. AI will propose the optimal tech stack and learning steps. Then, proceed with learning while challenging quizzes for each step.
faqItems.a3: Enter your learning goal, tech stack (optional), and current level on the homepage, then click the 'Propose Plan' button. After reviewing and editing the plan proposed by AI, click 'Proceed with this Plan' to generate a detailed roadmap.
faqItems.a4: Yes, you can edit it from the 'Edit settings and regenerate' button on the roadmap page. You can customize the tech stack and learning steps to suit your needs.
faqItems.a5: You can access past projects from the 'History' section in the sidebar. You can also quickly find specific projects using the search function.
faqItems.a6: Yes, selecting a level (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced) when creating a project automatically adjusts the quiz difficulty. Beginner level covers basic concepts, while Advanced level includes advanced topics like performance optimization and security.
faqItems.q7: Where can I check quiz results?
faqItems.a7: When you complete quizzes for each step, your score and accuracy rate are displayed. You can check the completion status and score of each step in a list on the roadmap page.
faqItems.q8: How many questions are in a quiz?
faqItems.a8: There are 10 multiple-choice questions for each step. The questions gradually increase in difficulty, covering a wide range from basics to applications.
faqItems.q9: What are the free plan limits?
faqItems.a9: The free plan allows you to create up to 5 projects per month. If you want unlimited use, priority support, or advanced analytics features, please consider upgrading to the Pro plan.
faqItems.a10: You can change your username and profile image from the settings page. Select 'Settings' from the user menu in the sidebar.
faqItems.a11: Yes, you can switch between Japanese and English from the language switch button at the top of the sidebar. Settings are automatically saved.

hero.subtitle: Stop getting lost in tutorials. Start with your goal, and let AI build the bridge to get you there.

problem.title: The Learning Trap
problem.p1Desc: Watching endless videos without ever building anything real.
problem.p2Desc: Too many technologies, frameworks, and tools. Where do you start?
problem.p3Desc: Learning random syntax instead of cohesive skills needed for a project.

solution.title: The Reverse Learn Method
solution.subtitle: We flip the script. You define the destination, we provide the map.
solution.s1Desc: Define exactly what you want to build. A chat app? A SaaS platform? We start there.
solution.s2Desc: AI selects the perfect modern tools for your specific project, explaining WHY they were chosen.
solution.s3Desc: Break down complex projects into manageable, bite-sized learning modules.

value.title: Why Cartes?
value.card1Desc: Learn by doing. Build real applications from day one.
value.card2Desc: Custom curriculums generated instantly based on your goals.
value.card3Desc: Quizzes and steps that evolve with your progress.

features.title: Your Journey to Mastery
features.step1Desc: Tell us what you want to build. Be as specific or vague as you like.
features.step2Desc: AI generates a tailored learning path with the optimal tech stack.
features.step3Desc: Verify your skills with interactive quizzes at every milestone.

useCases.title: Who is this for?
useCases.c1Desc: Build a portfolio that gets you hired.
useCases.c2Desc: Fast-track your transition with targeted learning.
useCases.c3Desc: Finally build that idea you've had for years.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.a1: Yes, you can generate up to 5 roadmaps per month for free.
faq.a2: No. You can set your level to 'Beginner' and we will guide you from scratch.
faq.a3: Everything. From Web (React, Vue) to Mobile (Flutter, Swift) and Backend (Go, Python).

paywall.title: Unlock Complex Logic
paywall.description: Step 4+ involves complex logic and security checks. Upgrade to Cartes Advanced to ensure your code is safe and scalable.
